context_for_next_testing_agent: Production-ready test completed. All 4 phases passed: Critical Path (login flow, dual theme, PRO badges), New Pages (pricing, search), Core Features (job cards, invoices, chat, legal), Mocked Features (payments, usage limits). Application is LAUNCH READY.
